// Timer.ts
/**
 * A class representing a timer.
 */export class Timer{/**
	 * Creates an instance of Timer.
	 */constructor(){this.seconds=void 0;this.minutes=void 0;this.hours=void 0;this.timerElement=void 0;this.intervalId=void 0;this.isStopped=void 0;this.seconds=0;this.minutes=0;this.hours=0;this.timerElement=document.getElementById("timer");this.intervalId=null;this.isStopped=true;}/**
	 * Starts the timer interval.
	 */start(){this.intervalId=setInterval(()=>{this.seconds++;if(this.seconds>=60){this.seconds=0;this.minutes++;if(this.minutes>=60){this.minutes=0;this.hours++;}}this.updateDisplay();},1000);this.isStopped=false;}/**
	 * Stops the timer interval.
	 */stop(){if(this.intervalId!==null){clearInterval(this.intervalId);this.intervalId=null;// Set intervalId to null after clearing the interval
}else{this.start();this.stop();this.reset();}this.isStopped=true;}/**
	 * Resets the timer to zero.
	 */reset(){this.seconds=0;this.minutes=0;this.hours=0;this.updateDisplay();this.isStopped=true;}/**
	 * Updates the timer display element with the current time.
	 */updateDisplay(){const displayHours=this.hours<10?"0"+this.hours:this.hours;const displayMinutes=this.minutes<10?"0"+this.minutes:this.minutes;const displaySeconds=this.seconds<10?"0"+this.seconds:this.seconds;this.timerElement.textContent="".concat(displayHours,":").concat(displayMinutes,":").concat(displaySeconds);}/**
	 * Returns the timer as a string in the format "hours:minutes:seconds".
	 * @returns The timer as a string.
	 */toString(){return"".concat(this.hours,":").concat(this.minutes,":").concat(this.seconds);}/**
	 * Returns the timer as a number (hours * 10000 + minutes * 100 + seconds).
	 * @returns The timer as a number.
	 */toNumber(){return this.hours*10000+this.minutes*100+this.seconds;}}
